004package mkt.model;
005
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import mkt.Model;
008
009/** Fix quantum model */
010public class Qmob {
011  /**
012   * Constructor.
013   * @return InvModel
014   */
015  public static Model mk () {
016    return new Model(
017      "QMOV",
018      "Quantum móvil",
019      new String[]{"Intervalo"},
020      new int[]{Model.PERC_PARAM},
021      (closes, params) -> {
022        double gap = params[0];
023        double upGap = 1 + gap;
024        double downGap = 1 - gap;
025        double[] cls0 = closes[0];
026        int ndates = closes.length;
027        int ncos = cls0.length;
028
029        double[][] allRefs = new double[ndates][ncos];
030        boolean[] isSolds = new boolean[ncos];
031        Arrays.fill(isSolds, false);
032        double[] refs = new double[ncos];
033        for (int i = 0; i < ncos; ++i) refs[i] = cls0[i] * downGap;
034
035        allRefs[0] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
036        for (int idate = 1; idate < ndates; ++idate) {
037          double[] closesR = closes[idate];
038
039          for (int ico = 0; ico < ncos; ++ico) {
040            double c = closesR[ico];
041            double rf = refs[ico];
042
043            if (isSolds[ico]) {
044              if (c > rf) {
045                isSolds[ico] = false;
046                refs[ico] = c * downGap;
047              } else {
048                double newRf = c * upGap;
049                refs[ico] = newRf > rf ? rf : newRf;
050              }
051            } else {
052             if (c < rf) {
053                isSolds[ico] = true;
054                refs[ico] = c * upGap;
055              } else {
056                double newRf = c * downGap;
057                refs[ico] = newRf < rf ? rf : newRf;
058              }
059            }
060          }
061          allRefs[idate] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
062        }
063        return allRefs;
064      }
065    );
066  }
067}
